There is an enormous amount of drug trafficking, Sex trafficking and a lot of bad people are coming through our borders. Yes their are a lot of great Latinos in this country and my husband is one of them but what basically everybody is saying is that Donald Trump is a horrible person and a racist simply because he wants to stop illegal immigration in this country. let's not get started on what people are saying about Donald Trump supporters. That we're ignorant that we are racist. And please don't lecture me on how I should respond to things! Like I'm some child in a classroom and you're the teacher. You're being extremely condescending.
